General.Name: Diriteks Dirilis Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Diriteks Dirilis Tekstil Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. manufactures and sells blankets and non-slip carpets. It also offers acrylic yarn. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Isparta, Turkey.

0.Name: Mr. Abdullah  Yigitbasi
0.Title: Chairman of Directors and Gen. Mang.
